items.title: Valedictory Ceremony Instrument Rating & Examiners' Course
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau Ministry of Defence Valedictory Ceremony Instrument Rating & Examiners' Course Aircrew Examining Board (AEB) of Indian Air Force marks a milestone with successful completion of 23rd Combined Instrument Rating Instructor and Examiner (CIRIE) course at Air Force Station Hindan. Posted On: 28 FEB 2026 12:22PM by PIB Delhi Aircrew Examining Board (AEB), which is entrusted to uphold …

items.title: Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah extends greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau Ministry of Home Affairs Union Home Minister and Minister of Cooperation Shri Amit Shah extends greetings to all our scientists, researchers on National Science Day Your quest lights our path shaping solutions for a better future May this day renew our zest and resolve to innovate, build and craft destiny of our choice Posted On: 28 FEB 2026 1:41PM by PIB Delhi Union Home Minist…

items.title: NITI Aayog Convenes Frontier 50 Workshop: Advancing Intelligent Governance in Aspirational Blocks
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau NITI Aayog NITI Aayog Convenes Frontier 50 Workshop: Advancing Intelligent Governance in Aspirational Blocks Posted On: 28 FEB 2026 12:42PM by PIB Delhi NITI Aayog convened the Frontier 50 Workshop on 27th February 2026, under the Aspirational Districts and Blocks Programme (ADP/ABP), marking a strategic shift from digital governance to intelligent AI-enabled governance in publi…

items.title: The Evolving Spectrum of Energy Sources
items.snippet: Press Release:Press Information Bureau PIB Headquarters The Evolving Spectrum of Energy Sources Posted On: 28 FEB 2026 11:01AM by PIB Delhi Every day, as lights turn on across homes, schools, farms, factories, and hospitals, we rarely think about where that energy comes from. The fan that cools a classroom, the pump that waters a field, and the train that carries passengers all depend on a vast and carefully managed …
